explains: n. 安装；分期付款；部分；就职
wordGroup: installment plan n. 分期付款方式；分期付款购物法
installment payment 分期付款；分期付款帐户
payment by installment 分期付款

sentences.en: Martine puts it down to, among other things, soap operas and installment plans introduced in the 1970s.
sentences.cn: 玛蒂娜将其归因于20世纪70年代推出的肥皂剧和分期付款计划等原因。尽管是间接的，两者在降低出生率方面都发挥了重要的作用。

sentences.en: After the first installment, Dickens wrote to the artist and asked him to correct a drawing Dickens felt was not faithful enough to his prose.
sentences.cn: 在第一期之后，狄更斯写信给这位画家，请他修改一幅狄更斯认为和自己的散文不够相符的画。

sentences.en: I'll discuss this in my next installment.
sentences.cn: 我将在下一部分讨论这个问题。
